TopicTitle: Maneuver button only available on future trajectory after , not current trajerctory

Articles.Content:
As seen in provided screenshots, I have an intersect with the mun, which then ejects me back around kerbin, for another intersect with the mun.

Current Trajectory (Intersect #1): I am unable to create a maneuver plan.

Future Trajectory (Intersect #2): I am able to create a trajectory (for some reason?)

This simply seems like a mix up in the code between which trajectory the buttons are available. so hopefully an east fix?

Note: this is directly after updating to the first patch.

PC specs are in a previous post of mine if required.

Steps to recreate: get an intersect with the mun, which then gives you a gravity assist for another intersect with the mun, this will show you your current intersect in BLUE orbital lines, and future intersect in ORANGE orbital lines.
